item.title: Duel stop on devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

This Is what i did to remove it from right click so no-one can duel anyway.

Search in client.java for trade with and below that there should be a duel option set out the sameâ€¦delete the whole duel text which should be about 5 lines or so.

Be sure not to delete anything but the duel text.

Hope i Helped
